# [Interview #1115: Firefight Tour - El Cerrito, CA, Entry #46](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1115#46)

#### Question

Are we going to see more of that world?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes.

#### Question

Sweet!

#### Brandon Sanderson

Thredony is the name of that world. [Threnody is correct spelling]
